strats.name: Get Hit By Beetom
note: Either place a Power Bomb on the ledge with the Geega bug farms, to only break the top row of blocks and not kill the Beetom,
or move the Beetom to safety by shaking it off at a higher platform before breaking the Power Bomb blocks.
strats.devNote: Obstacle A cannot already be broken, because otherwise the Beetom will already be killed.

nodes.name: Red Tower Top Right Door (to Hellway)

runways.name: Base Runway - Red Tower Top Right Door (to Hellway)

strats.name: Get Hit By Beetom
note: Without any suits or tanks, Samus will need to move the Beetom part way up the room, shake it off, and go back and farm multiple times.
While the Beetom is near the top section, by the Rippers, shake the Beetom off, and re-grab it and ascend the shaft.
Either use frozen Rippers as platforms, while shooting diagonally to prevent freezing the Beetom, or kill the Rippers before ascending.
Be careful not to apply too many inputs after grabbing the Beetom in order to get to the top before it is shaken off.
devNote: Some items may reduce the number of Beetom hits, but it's irrelevant since there is an accesible farm in-room.
FIXME: Add more options for how to ascend the shaft, either without HiJump, or without killing the Rippers. These may need to be notable.

nodes.name: Red Tower Junction (Above Bottom Climb)
nodes.note: This is under the orange door, below the shot blocks, but above the bottom climb

nodes.name: Red Tower Junction (Middle of Bottom Climb)
nodes.note: This is meant to contain all Rippers in the bottom climb except the bottom one

nodes.name: Red Tower Bottom Junction
Red Tower Top Climb Junction
nodes.note: This is meant to contain all Rippers in the top climb except the bottom one

farmCycles.name: Alternating Geega Pipes
farmCycles.note: Standing on the platform next to the right spawner, must jump to get Geegas to spawn from the left one.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Red Tower R-Mode Frozen Beetom X-Ray Climb
note: Gain R-mode while entering the room.
Use the respawning bugs to refill reserve energy.
Get grabbed by the Beetom and carry it to the 4-tile high gap one screen above the bottom-left door.
Position Samus one pixel to the right of being against the wall.
Jump and aim down, reaching the ceiling at the same time that reserves are triggered.
This will force Samus to stand up, briefly clipping into the wall above.
Immediately freeze the Beetom inside the wall, by buffering a shot during the reserve trigger.
Use a Ripper to get knocked back onto the frozen Beetom.
This will clip Samus one pixel left into the wall, making it possible to X-ray climb.
X-ray climb up 2 screens.

strats.name: R-Mode Frozen Beetom X-Ray Climb
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Red Tower R-Mode Frozen Beetom X-Ray Climb
note: Gain R-mode while entering the room.
Use the respawning bugs to refill reserve energy.
Get grabbed by the Beetom and carry it to the 4-tile high gap one screen above the bottom-left door.
Position Samus one pixel to the right of being against the wall.
Jump and aim down, reaching the ceiling at the same time that reserves are triggered.
This will force Samus to stand up, briefly clipping into the wall above.
Immediately freeze the Beetom inside the wall, by buffering a shot during the reserve trigger.
Use a Ripper to get knocked back onto the frozen Beetom.
This will clip Samus one pixel left into the wall, making it possible to X-ray climb.
X-ray climb up 2 screens.
strats.devNote: Given the ability to freeze enemies, nodes 1 and 5 are freely connected, so lumping these into one strat is sound.

strats.name: Red Tower Spark
note: Come in charged from the top left door. With missiles selected, position Samus roughly in the horizontal center of the room.
Crouch, aim up, then in very quick succession, shoot a missile upwards then spark up.
If done correctly, Samus will pass the Missile, break the bomb block platforms, then be passed by the Missile which will break the shot blocks at the top.

to.note: Direct link for shinespark. Other strats should go 1 -> 9 -> 5.

strats.name: Red Tower X-Ray Climb
strats.note: This is a short climb of only a few tiles.

strats.name: Red Tower IBJ Between the Bottom Rippers
strats.note: Requires switching between single and double IBJs. While Doubles are not techincally necessary, they make the strat more bearable.

strats.name: Red Tower Midair HBJ
note: Starting on the right ledge at the bottom of Red Tower, wall jump just below the middle plant, just above the top ripper.
Place two bombs out of the wall jump landing on the first bomb and getting boosted by both.
While rising, place two more bombs for a second HBJ. Colliding with the side of the ledge after the third bomb can help.

strats.name: R-Mode Frozen Beetom X-Ray Climb
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Red Tower R-Mode Frozen Beetom X-Ray Climb
note: Gain R-mode while entering the room.
Use the respawning bugs to refill reserve energy.
Get grabbed by the Beetom and carry it to the 4-tile high gap one screen above the bottom-left door.
Position Samus one pixel to the right of being against the wall.
Jump and aim down, reaching the ceiling at the same time that reserves are triggered.
This will force Samus to stand up, briefly clipping into the wall above.
Immediately freeze the Beetom inside the wall, by buffering a shot during the reserve trigger.
Use a Ripper to get knocked back onto the frozen Beetom.
This will clip Samus one pixel left into the wall, making it possible to X-ray climb.
X-ray climb up 2 screens.

to.note: This link is only for sparking. Other strats go 8 -> 7 -> 6.

strats.name: Walljump
strats.note: Kill the rippers then walljump up.

strats.name: Red Tower Hero Shot
strats.note: Wall jump between the Rippers. Either shoot the block, fall, and quickly climb again, or shoot from the bottom and follow Samus's shot up the tower.

strats.name: Space Jump
note: This strat is for killing all of the Rippers and then using Space Jump to get up without wall jumps.
Space jump up near the shot block, then shoot it while falling right as it goes off screen, then space jump back up.

strats.name: Red Tower IBJ
strats.note: Without canJumpIntoIBJ, you will need to kill the Rippers and break the bomb blocks then start from the platforms below.

nodes.name: Red Firefleas Left Door (to X-Ray)

runways.name: Base Runway - Red Firefleas Left Door (to X-Ray)

note: Requires opening the door, then going to the middle of the room to use the really small runway.
ShinesparkFrames are at 0 because the shinespark frames are accounted for in the path to door.

strats.name: XMode
strats.devNote: Two spike hits are expected per attempt (with any additional leniency hits being multiplied by this amount).

nodes.name: Red Firefleas Right Door (to Red Tower)

runways.name: Base Runway - Red Firefleas Right Door (to Red Tower)

strats.name: Base
strats.note: Requires opening the door, then going to pit in the middle of the room to use the really small runway.

strats.name: XMode
note: Jump from the entry runway to bounce onto spikes for XMode.
Store a spark in XMode and use that to shinepark across the room.
Bumping a solid tile before activating XMode will remove dash state, preventing shinecharging.
strats.devNote: Two spike hits are expected per attempt (with any additional leniency hits being multiplied by this amount).

enemies.groupName: Red Brinstar Fireflea Room Left Yapping Maws
Red Brinstar Fireflea Room Right Yapping Maw

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.note: Enter the door high to avoid a frame perfect spike hit.
devNote: FIXME: There is one frame where ending the spark early puts you over spikes with no avoiding them, unless you entered the room at top of door.
Which frame is determined by actual shinesparkFrames and shinespark velocity.

strats.name: X-Ray Exit Damage Boost
note: If you wait long enough, a Waver will arrive. After it turns around to go back to the right, damage boost off of it, then follow it.
Continue to hit it to get iframes to avoid taking damage from any spikes.

strats.name: X-Ray Exit Spike Floor
strats.note: This strat is simply running and jumping across the spikes.

strats.name: In-Room Shinespark
strats.note: Use the really small runway in a pit in the middle of the room.

strats.name: XMode Shinespark
note: Jump from the entry runway to bounce onto spikes for XMode.
Store a spark in XMode and use that to shinepark across the room.
Bumping a solid tile before activating XMode will remove dash state, preventing shinecharging.
strats.devNote: Omitting leniency spikeHits, since the firefleas provide an opportunity to farm after a failed attempt.

strats.name: X-Ray Access Ice Bridge
note: Cross the gaps by freezing multiple enemies or by refreezing a Waver while standing on it.
Be careful running on frozen enemies.
Freeze the final Waver high and walljump up, or wait for the second Waver to come back.

strats.name: Ice and HiJump
strats.note: Use the Fireflea when it moves to the right to cross the first gap.

strats.name: X-Ray Access SpikeJumps with HiJump
note: Jump to the door leading to X-Ray either by jumping from spikes or with a very precise jump.
Cross the room by Jumping atop the spikes.
Taking enemy damage can be used to reduce some spike damage.
The final jump can either be made by jumping from the bottommost spike stair or from the safe stair.
Setup run speed atop the spike stair by holding forward to be pushed backward.
The safe stair jump is much harder, but can be made without every pixel of runway.

strats.name: X-Ray Access Damage Boost
note: A precise strat that involves crossing both gaps by dboosting off Wavers.
The Wavers are also used for iframes to avoid taking damage from any spikes.

strats.name: Jump and Speedball

strats.name: Below Spazer Jump Shot Speedball
note: Jump from the Spazer Room door with speed to break the bomb blocks.
Time a precise shot during the jump to clear the shot block.
Note: Spazer can trivially break the shot block by shooting forward before jumping.
